description:
For those of you that have always wanted to learn guitar, but never had the courage, or those of you that have finally picked it up but are unsure of what to learn first, this is the beginner course for you!

This is the electric guitar course for you, the absolute beginner, I even cover the purchasing of guitars and amps,you in mind.

You will learn the very basics of the instrument, and finish with a good knowledge base to carry you in good stead for your life as a musician.

You will start really simple, and take things nice and slow, step by step.

You are offered some mental tricks and tools that allow you to overcome obstacles that you may come across as a player.

In roughly ten minutes a day, you will have the course completed within a week, but I encourage you to take things slowly, and allow knowledge to soak in, as guitar technique in particular can take significant time to master.

This course contains the most important and valuable beginner information, all in one course, as well as honest information about where you can go after the course is completed in order to continue in your guitar playing journey.
title: Learning Electric Guitar for Absolute Beginners
